name: rtppreproc
label: RTP Preprocessing Pipeline
description: RTP-preproc runs the MRtrix3 preprocessing pipeline, based on FSL's topup when the optional inverse phase encoded data are provided, otherwise the pipeline uses FSL's eddy tool. The pipeline can also perform de-noising, reslicing, and alignment to an anatomical image. Required inputs are diffusion NIfTI, BVEC, BVAL, and Anatomical (ACPC aligned) NIfTI.
author: MRtrix, FSL, ANTs and Brain-Life teams.

rpe.description: Specify if there are reverse phase encoded data. Options are 'none', 'header', 'pairs', 'all'. See mrtrix docs to understand values. Important: 'all' is expecting one file, but two need to be provided, this script will concatenate them. If a concatenaded one is passed, it will assume rpe='none'. [default=none]

eddy.description: Perform eddy current correction. If inverted phase encoding direction files are found, eddy will be done as part of topup. [default=true]

bias.description: Compute bias correction with ANTs on dwi data [default=false]

norm.description: Perform intensity normalization of dwi data [default=false]

nval.description: Normalize the intensity of the FA white matter mask to this number [default=1000]

saveoutput.description: Save all the intermediate files (both .mif and .nii.gz), for QC and debugging [default=false]

reslice.description: Optional. By default reslicing is not done. If you want it done, set doreslice=true and set a number (e.g., 1) here to reslice the dwi data to this isotropic voxel size (in mm).

ANAT.description: Optional anatomical T1w NIfTI image. Required only if anatalign=true

FSMASK.description: Optional freesurfer mask, if not passed FSL will calculate it internally.

RDIF.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) diffusion NIfTI image.

RBVL.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) BVAL file.

RBVC.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) BVEC file.
